title: The Return of the Soul
creator: Robert Smythe Hichens
description: LibriVox recording of THE RETURN OF THE SOUL, by ROBERT SMYTHE HICHENS. Read by ROGER MELIN. Can the soul of the dead come back to haunt the one who was responsible for its death? What would happen if the responsible one did not believe it could be so, and yet was in love with the returned soul? The Return of the Soul is a horror story of a man who is visited by the returning soul of a deceased, and who has some very perplexing issues to deal with upon that return. (Introduction by Roger Melin) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; literature; audiobook; horror; ghost story; ghost stories; hichens; robert smythe hichens
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text

reviews.reviewbody:
Good story. Beautifully read.
Thank you, i enjoyed it very much and passed it on.
